DOC.brief_title: Study Assess Effect Consumption Fish Oil Encapsulated Inflammatory Markers Colorectal Cancer
DOC.detailed_description: The study recruit patient newly diagnose colorectal cancer yet undergone chemotherapy treatment . Individuals meet inclusion criterion randomize mean computer program two study group : 1 ) supplement Experimental : receive 2g/day supplementation encapsulate fish oil 9 week . 2 ) No intervention - control : receive supplementation fish oil placebo . Will assess effect supplementation standard profile cytokine production , nutritional status , proportion incorporation fatty acid blood cell ( mononuclear red blood cell ) . Blood sample collect start first chemotherapy nine week later . Supplementation experimental group also start first day chemotherapy .
